archimate:BusinessEvent.name: Tietoevry Connect looses the capability to deliver services to Tietoevry Banking
archimate:BusinessEvent.documentation:
Tietoevry Connect is providing capacity services for Tietoevry Banking. In order to operate these services, the environment and processes used for service delivery must meet PCI-DSS and SWIFT requirements.
If capability to deliver banking services is lost, we end up loosing the banking customers.
Loss amount is still unclear, work-in-progress
